thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Tania

author: Tania
title: Tania
text:
This trip was fantastico! The people from Ecuador are sooo welcoming and eager to plese you and make your trip an unforgetable one. You can expirience the culture of a country only through the people that live there.
Ecuadorian people make you feel like family. The food was excusite and always satisfiying. Nature in Galapagos was a dream; there are no words that can describe the natural beauty of these Islands. If you visit Galapagos you will be one step closer to heaven.
